alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 08 at 7:52AM CST until February 11 at 1:02AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Poteau River near Panama. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 37.0 feet, extensive flooding of crop and pasturelands occur between Shady Point and Arkoma. Many roads in the floodplain become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 21.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 37.0 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Friday evening. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
